TextLibrary.Text: Wait. That man's uniform. He works for my father, the Selentine Emperor.
Wait. That man's uniform. He works for my father, the Selentine Emperor.
Wait. That man's uniform. He works for my father, the Selentine Emperor.
Wait. That man's uniform. He works for my father, the Selentine Emperor.
Doing what, exactly? Hunting stray Gnolls?
Doing what, exactly? Hunting stray Gnolls?

Doing what, exactly? Hunting stray Gnolls?
No. He is one of the Imperial Assassins. This Gnoll did something serious if they've tracked him all the way up here.
